name: Fightcrawlers
description:
Fightcrawlers is a fighting game developed with 2d Fighter Maker 2nd. It currently only has a Versus Mode available, with an Arcade Mode still being in development.

Synopsis

In Richstar City, in the country of Amberia, the paths of ten individuals cross when a mysterious object falls from the sky.

Controls

This game has very simple controls consisting on six different commands: light attack, strong attack, block, projectile, grab and special attack. With the blue keys assigned to Player 1 and the red keys to Player 2, the game controls can be easily modified in the "Option" tag above the game window.

Characters
